name: BigPappaFrogg
description:
Welcome to BigPappaFrog! 

Inspired by the Male Darwin Frog and his insane ability to store the entire lot of eggs in his vocal sac for safe storage while they incubate and form into small version of their BigPappaFrog!

Play as the Male Darwin Frog as he attempts to recover his precious eggs whilst avoiding and sometimes eating those pesky Diving Beetles!

This game has a few known "bugs" as well as some bugs that are meant to be there!

Avoid the ones I added and point out the ones I didnt!

  • "Tongue Attack" has no animation and the sound on killing enemies doesnt work.
  • Eggs sometimes go out of bounds, you should be able to grab them with the Tongue.
How to Play:
  • Left Click to Move
  • Right Click or Spacebar to "Tongue Attack" toward the mouse
Closing Thoughts and Credits:

I hope everyone enjoys the game! I've learned a great deal on this project and might continue it in the future. I am very proud of the current "finished"  product and all of it's features and bugs :)

Made with:

  • Godot 3.2
  • Aseprite
  • SFXR

Player Frog, Beetle, Egg and Arrow art was all done by me!

The Background, Walls, Trees, Bushes are all from HeartBeasts Youtube Tutorial

Start Menu Music and Main Game Music from - BenSound

And a ton of YT Tutorials that I cant remember to name. If I've missed something very specific I apologize, please let me know and I will gladly give credit where it is due!
